name: Little People's Movin' & Groovin'
description: Percussion, movement, rhythm & motion. Tots and their caregivers explore a world of improv and dance and drumming with movement and callbacks. Children are encouraged to speak in class, learning how to follow directions, play with others through music.
fullDescription: Percussion, movement, rhythm & motion. Tots and their caregivers explore a world of improv and dance and drumming with movement and callbacks. Children are encouraged to speak in class, learning how to follow directions, play with others through music.
whatTheyOffer: Percussion, movement, rhythm & motion. Tots and their caregivers explore a world of improv and dance and drumming with movement and callbacks. Children are encouraged to speak in class, learning how to follow directions, play with others through music.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900 Check Calendar for availability.
